solution_line_template: If she receives {requests_per_day} job requests every day and works on {works_on_per_day} every day, she remains with {requests_per_day}-{works_on_per_day} = <<{requests_per_day}-{works_on_per_day}={remaining_per_day}>>{remaining_per_day} requests.
After {num_days} days, she will be remaining with {num_days}*{remaining_per_day} = <<{num_days}*{remaining_per_day}={total_remaining}>>{total_remaining} requests which she hasn't worked on.
